mapper.sql: id, tearcher_id, student_id, create_id, modify_id, create_time, modify_time, site_id
mapper.insert: insert into t_student_star_info ( tearcher_id, student_id, create_id, modify_id, create_time, modify_time, site_id) values ( #{tearcherId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{studentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{siteId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
